pl.mazur.simpleabclibrary.dao

Class ReservationDAOImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • pl.mazur.simpleabclibrary.dao.ReservationDAOImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ReservationDAO

    @Repository
public class ReservationDAOImpl
extends Object
implements ReservationDAO
    Repository class for performing database operations on Reservation objects.
    Author:
    Marcin Mazur
